sources.title: Everything's on Ice (1939) aka Frolics On Ice | Comedy, Music | Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A rascal turns his little niece into a skating star, but spends more money than she makes.

Also Known As: Frolics on Ice 
Director: Erle C. Kenton
Writers: Adrian Landis, Sherman L. Lowe 
Stars: Irene Dare, Edgar Kennedy, Roscoe Karns 
Genres: Comedy, Music
